Articles.Content: I'm getting a large collection of quicksaves and I'd like to clean them out. How?
In your KSP directory > saves > name_of_you_game, Anything that's not called persistent.sfs is a quicksave. For God's sake don't delete persisnent.sfs or you loose everything.
It would be really nice if there was a delete button in the alt+F5 GUI, you should not have to go into the game's files to remove a quickload.
You probably want to learn that anyway since mods like KAC, AGExt will also spam there
